headline: Blystone schedules town hall meeting in Lima
sentences: LIMA — Joe Blystone, a Republican running for Ohio governor, will hold a town hall meeting from 7 to 9 p.m. Thursday, Feb. 24 at UNOH Event Center, 1450 N. Cable Road, Lima.
Blystone, who describes himself as a “constitutional conservative,” is running against incumbent Gov.
He will share his stance on major issues and answer questions during a casual town hall.
Mike DeWine in the May primary.
